Day 1 (March 5, 2022): Departure from Chicago

* Self-drive from Chicago to Wilmington (duration: 14 hours 11 mins, distance: 1,505 km, cost: 75)

Day 1 - Day 3 (March 5 - March 7, 2022): Accommodation in Wilmington

* Non-shared pet-friendly accommodations for two people and pets: $225 per night x 3 nights = $675

Day 3 (March 7, 2022): Travel from Wilmington to Charlotte

* Self-drive from Wilmington to Charlotte (duration: 3 hours 24 mins, distance: 324 km, cost: 16)

Day 3 - Day 5 (March 7 - March 9, 2022): Accommodation in Charlotte

* Non-shared pet-friendly accommodations for two people and pets: $200 per night x 3 nights = $600

Day 5 (March 9, 2022): Return to Chicago

* Self-drive from Charlotte to Chicago (duration: 11 hours 39 mins, distance: 1,215 km, cost: 60)

Total Cost: Gas for self-driving + Accommodations = $75 + $675 + $16 + $600 + $60 = $1,526
Remaining Budget: $3,600 - $1,526 = $2,074

Additional Activities and Meals within the budget of $2,074. It is essential to plan your activities, meals, and other expenses accordingly to ensure that you stay within your budget for this 5-day travel itinerary.
